dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3012 IH: Empowering Youth Through Summer Employment Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Kildee introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for youth workforce investment activities.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Empowering Youth Through Summer Employment Act.
Section 136(a) of the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act (29 U.S.C. 3181(a)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking and $963,837,000 and inserting $1,013,837,000; and
by inserting before the period at the end the following: , $1,013,837,000 for fiscal year 2021, and $1,013,837,000 for fiscal year 2022.
